TopicTitle: [Linux] CLOSED - Changing symmetry mode in VAB causes crash to desktop

Articles.Content:
Whenever I try to change the symmetry mode of a part in the VAB, the game silently crashes.

Not every part will do this - I've had a 100% reproduction rate with trying to place a 2.5m nose cone on top of a 2.5m fuel tank.

**Steps to reproduce**:

1. Place the attached .craft file into (KSP folder)/saves/(save folder)/Ships/VAB
2. Open the attached .craft in the VAB
3. Pick up a 2.5m nose cone from the Aerodynamics tab
4. Hover the nose cone over the attach node on top of the exposed fuel tanks, but do not place it
5. Press X (or symmetry-change button, if remapped) to change the symmetry mode

More information is available in [this bug report](http://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/5221).
